long_description: Perfect for cool-weather runs, the REI Tech-Compatible Powerflyte gloves feature special threads in the thumbs and forefingers so you can use your touch-screen device while keeping your digits warm. Powerflyte material blends polyester, nylon and spandex to provide outstanding dexterity; fabric breathes well, dries fast and provides good warmth. Tech-compatible forefinger and thumb threads let you operate your touch-screen device without taking your gloves off. Stretchy fabric conforms to the shape of your hands for a great fit. REI Tech-Compatible Powerflyte gloves have reflective hits to increase your visibility at night. Overstock.
